recipe.title: Little Chick(en) Baby Food (9+ Months) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 8 oz ; potato, washed, peeled and cooked ; (225 g)
8 oz ; green beans, washed and steamed ; (225 g)
5 oz ; chicken, cooked without seasoning ; (140 g)
water, can use breast milk or formula

steps.step: Cook chicken without any seasoning. Boil or steam potatoes. Steam green beans. Allow all to cool.
Add potatoes, green beans, chicken, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor. Blend very well.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add potatoes, green beans, chicken, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.
